name: God Not Found
description:
Two people walked into religion.
One came alive.
The other drowned.

A short adaptation of the book "The Song of the Bird" by Anthony de Mello

Turn on fullscreen for better experience.

Inspirations
  • Book "The Song of the Bird" by Anthony de Mello
  • Book and movie "The Name of the Rose" by Umberto Eco / Jean-Jacques Annaud
  • Game "The Old Man Club" by Michael Koloch
  • Animation "Jesus' Betrayal: What Really Went Down" by Ethereal Snake
